title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Zürich, Switzerland
description:
Zurich is glad to join in the fun that is the Global Day of Coderetreat (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/).
 
We're open for registrations at Coders Only | Zurich (http://zurich.codersonly.org/events/code-retreat/).

Seats are limited so don't hesitate!
